definitions.title: vb. Niph.
definitions.body: grow warm and tender, be or grow hot (NH id. Pi. heat fruit in the ground, making it ripe, over-ripe, tender; Aram. [[כְּמַר]] id., and more gen. make warm (one's flesh, or food); cf. kemr, fermentation, etc., in mod. Syria Wetzst:ZPV xiv (1891), 6)—

grow warm and tender, fig., subj. [[רחמים]]; ´[[רַחֲמָיו אֶל־אָחִיונ]] Ge 43:30 (J), so [[רַחֲמֶיהָ עַל־בְּנׇהּ]] ´[[נ]] 1Ki 3:26; ([[רַחֲמָָי]] We) [[נִחוּמָָי]] ´[[יַחַד נ]] Ho 11:8 (‖[[עָלַי לִבִּינֶהְפַּךְ]]).
be or grow hot, ´[[עוֹרֵנוּ כְתַנּוּר נ]]´[[מִפְּנֵי וגו]] La 5:10 our skin has become hot like a furnace, because of the famine.
